title: After banning Chinese apps, India now plans to shut down CCP propaganda centres masquerading as ‘Confucius Institutes’

81-year-old grandmother to break her 28-year-old fast as her dream of magnificent Ram temple takes shape. Urmila Chaturvedi had taken a vow not to eat grains and sustain herself on a fruit and milk diet. Now, as her prayers have been answered, she finds it fit to break her fast.
